extensionAttribute.description: This attribute displays the status of the iSight Camera. The value to be verified will need to be specified when creating this extension attribute. Example: "disabled" verifies that the iSight Camera is disabled.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh desiredValue="EditFromTemplate_Desired_Value_-_Example:_disabled" if [ -d "/System/Library/Extensions/Apple_iSight.kext" ] || [ -d "/System/Library/QuickTime/QuickTimeUSBVDCDigitizer.component" ] || [ -d "/System/Library/PrivateFrameworks/CoreMediaIOServicesPrivate.framework/Versions/A/Resources/VDC.plugin" ]; then status="enabled" else status="disabled" fi if [ "$desiredValue" == "$status" ]; then echo "<result>Pass (iSight Status is: $status)</result>" else echo "<result>Fail (iSight Status is: $status)</result>" fi
